QuestData.Title: Bravo Company Field Kit: Camouflage
QuestData.Description: We're gonna need some supplies before we take out the Blackrock army and save Redridge. That's where you come in, rookie.$B$BKeeshan put me in charge of getting camouflage together for the Bravo Company field kit. What I need you to do is head south and do a little "gardening." There are two parts to this little adventure that you should know about: (1) Leaves and (2) Fox poop. We need 'em both.$B$BWhat did you think camo was made of?$B$BHead south and gather what I asked for, $g pal:lady;.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 5 Piles of Leaves and 5 pieces of Fox Poop.
QuestData.CompletionText: Leaves and poop - that's what I need.
QuestData.RewardText: Nice job, rookie. I'm gonna go ahead and put the camo in the box. We should be ready soon.
